title: "Game of Thrones" Coffee Cup Cameo & America's Next Top Battle | Eddie Izzard
itunes:title: "Game of Thrones" Coffee Cup Cameo & America's Next Top Battle | Eddie Izzard
description:
A Starbucks cup makes an accidental appearance on "Game of Thrones," Trevor muses about America's next war, and comedian Eddie Izzard chats about his global "Wunderbar" tour.
